context: A Python FastAPI service that exposes a POST /render endpoint, accepts Markdown text in the request body, and returns rendered HTML. Includes unit tests and Docker packaging.
acceptance_tests: POST /render returns 200 and HTML when given valid Markdown
Renders headings, bold, italics, links, and code blocks
Returns HTTP 400 for empty or invalid body
Includes pytest tests for success and error cases
Dockerfile builds a working container image
